org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.core

Class AbstractFieldMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.mapper.core.AbstractFieldMapper<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToXContent, FieldMapper<T>, Mapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllFieldMapper, BinaryFieldMapper, BooleanFieldMapper, CompletionFieldMapper, FieldNamesFieldMapper, GeoPointFieldMapper, GeoShapeFieldMapper, IdFieldMapper, IndexFieldMapper, NumberFieldMapper, ParentFieldMapper, RoutingFieldMapper, SourceFieldMapper, StringFieldMapper, TypeFieldMapper, UidFieldMapper, VersionFieldMapper

    public abstract class AbstractFieldMapper<T>
extends Object
implements FieldMapper<T>
